website_summaries.verdict: The tabs are densely packed with nutrients, yet they take up little space. Suitable to keep on hand for natural emergencies.
pros: 15 servings per container (could serve one person 8 days)
Tabs have sweet flavors like butterscotch and vanilla
cons: The tabs are not wrapped individually
With 12 grams of sugar per serving, not ideal for diabetics

customer_reviews.title: Not just for survival in the wilderness.... works for Alzheimer patient stopped eating solid food.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot tell you how happy we are to discover this product. My mother has Alzheimers and has stopped eating solid food, the only thing she accepts is milk and we stir in a tablet (which we pulverize and mix with a bit of warm water before stirring into milk). Unfortunately my mother will not accept Ensure or Boost or anything like that but the Survival tablet stirred into the milk works fantastic, also you can compress one tablet with 240 calories into less liquid even just 2 - 3 oz, which is more likely to be finished rather than a 8 oz of Ensure which has 220 calories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope I never have to use
customer_reviews.text: One day's serving (12 tabs) only provides 240 calories and no where near the % daily value recommended in fat, carbs or protein. These are essentially a glorified multivitamin! They're not even convenient, since you would need to chew one tab every hour throughout a 12 hour day... very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: LittleMissSunshine

customer_reviews.title: "8 day food supply" if you can survive on 240 calories/day (HINT: You cannot)
customer_reviews.text: Utterly deceptive marketing, and shame on Amazon for allowing this. This "8 day food supply" contains a TOTAL of 1,920 calories, which LESS than the average adult needs to consume in a SINGLE DAY. It's always repugnant when marketers lie. It's obscene when they lie about products that people buy to keep their families safe in case of extreme emergencies. This is as low as marketers get - which is truly saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Henry Higgensworth III

customer_reviews.title: Space food
customer_reviews.text: So these are not soft or chewy. They are hard and kinda like eating a soda cap minus the fiz. It should also be noted that at least with the vanilla ones they have a high dairy content so if you are lactose intolerant you may not want to be taking these with you into the field. These particular ones leave a milky after taste in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: whizzle

customer_reviews.title: great product, too much packaging
customer_reviews.text: These taste good, but the packaging for each packet is about three or four times bigger than it needs to be. I don't want to fold the packets in fear that they may get little holes and lose their freshness. Of course with any emergency supply, space/durability/freshness concerns are a big deal. I hope that this is something that they can modify, because otherwise it's a great product. I have a family member with some serious gluten intolerance issues, so I chose these with that in mind, and would certainly buy again. They really need to come up with smaller packaging, though, in order to be a primary bug out bag staple.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M. Enders

customer_reviews.title: 25year shelf life, light weight, good vitamin source.
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid hunter, fisherman, and outdoorsman. I’m these are a must have for emergency food. They taste pretty good. Each tab is only about 20 calories but it’s the vitamins that make them worth their weight in gold. Butter scotch isn’t bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan+Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Not food, more a vitamin.  Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Very deceptive advertising and packaging, hiding that almost no calories are provided. Package says take 12 tablets a day, to keep you going 48 hours per package (which you can stretch to 96 hours). Most of the package is used to compare nutrition based on 2000 calories a day, and also 2500 calories a day, implying the tablets provide that amount. The entire pack provides less than 500 calories —or just one quarter of one day’s needs. Criminal. How many people have been duped, relying on these for emergency situations, when they would need to be hiking to safety?
customer_reviews.author: Scott76

customer_reviews.title: Not the best tasting, have the consistency of Tums almost but ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best tasting, have the consistency of Tums almost but they don't make you thirsty and do keep you going. Tried going a day just using these and drinking two liters of water and wasn't bad at all, only got somewhat hungry towards night time. Tossed a few into my Bug out bags and keeping on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Austin S

customer_reviews.title: These strawberry-flavored tabs taste terrible (like chewable TUMS) and have 480 calories total in ...
customer_reviews.text: Might as well toss a few multi-vitamins in your food storage, a heavy granoloa bar and move on for far less money. These strawberry-flavored tabs taste terrible (like chewable TUMS) and have 480 calories total in an entire bag. I am glad I finally got around to opening a bag and trying some before ordering more for my husband's Go Bag/Car. 12g of fat, 30g of carbs, and 4g of protein. Truly surprised and how vastly different my conclusion is from so many other Amazon shoppers as to overall value of this purchase. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: good for what they are
customer_reviews.text: I like them and so does my daughter. They do have a slight dry milk taste, but the flavors mostly cover that. I tried eating just them a couple of days at work. They took the edge off of my hunger. I think they would work great in a survival situation and will keep you satisfied and not feeling hungry all day. One every hour, as the package states, works very well. I wanted to give the seller a good review, but accidentally sent a review of the seller below it in my orders page - sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A. Roos

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a bug out bag. While opening the box I had accidentally sliced open a bag of the vanilla flavored pack. I took this opportunity to taste a tab I was surprised at how good they are. They're sweet, a bit chalky, and have a very unique flavor almost like Ovaltine. One tab was enough to satiate me if I was hungry. They don't give you a lot of calories but will provide all of the vitamins and nutrients needed for survival or an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: avman

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind for Go-bag
customer_reviews.text: I want to get some vitamins in a desperate situation, and these fit the bill. The MRE biscuits have calories and carbs but zero nutrition, but necessary for energy. Add high protein bars and/or MRE peanut butter to round out minimum daily nutrition in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: expensive, but a great product
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my overboard bag on my boat. I keep a week supply in case the boat sinks and I end up in the life raft. They taste great. it is sort of like nestle's quick with vitamins and protein and fat. it tastes good, is rather healthy. it should keep you alive. I also eat them when riding my touring bike cross country.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving title and description
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of the description title this contains 4 packs of 24 tablets. Each tablet is only 20 calories for a total of 1,920 calories total. It is not 8 days worth it not even a full one days worth. Deceptive to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth e boys

customer_reviews.title: They may be good to make a food supply last longer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if these really work or not. I tried them out and by day two I was starving. They may be good to make a food supply last longer, but I don't know if you could get by on just these. The flavor isn't the greatest but about what you would think for something like this (a little chalky). Probably good for hiking and backpacking as a smaller replacement for energy bars, but you'll definitely be craving real food real fast.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an emergency....
customer_reviews.text: So I got these to keep in a kit I have in my vehicle. I ended up opening the packages and putting them in little pouches that I vacuum sealed with each pack getting equal number of flavors. 8 packs for 8 days, just like they advertise. I actually got 2 extra tabs in the chocolate, so I figured I would try them. It taste like a solid form of Nesquik powder. Not the best chocolate I have ever had, but it didn't suck. Would taste like chocolate cake if you were hungry.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Confused at how to ration these
customer_reviews.text: So confused. If you have 94 tablet and you take one every hour how does this add up to an 8 day supply of food?
customer_reviews.author: lionel pacombe

customer_reviews.title: Not 25 years shell life.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the 25 years of shell life and out of the 4 i received, one of them expires in 2040...5 years short. While the others will expire in 2044 which is not as advertised but pretty close (24). The 2040 however is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio

customer_reviews.title: 8 days of food.  Nope!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not 8 days of food. You got to be kidding me. Tablets are the size of quarters. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Myung Jun

customer_reviews.title: I always have MREs ) But I actually really enjoyed these, they're pretty bland and chalky yes
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these half as a joke ( when my friends get together for weekends; I always have MREs ) But I actually really enjoyed these, they're pretty bland and chalky yes. But for space and weight saving I think they are fantastic value. I wish they were cheaper or that I could say buy them in bulk ( like a 5gal bucket ) but I have no regrets and will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I was interested in the reviews of people eating them ...
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in the reviews of people using these on camping trips. I have opened all bags to test and have started using them as a meal replacement for lunch (one on lunch and one on each of my breaks). They keep me full and I have energy for my busy work day.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFireKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Essential for any emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in the event of a natural disaster (i.e., hurricane) where support may not be immediate (look at Katrina, Harvey, Irma and Maria). Tested one - not the most tasty, but edible. Purchased two for a total of 16 days supply which could be rationed for a month. I am saddened by the emergency responses by FEMA and Red Cross with the most recent hurricanes and have no confidence my needs would be met in an event where I live. Even if I were to evacuate to a shelter, will they have enough food for everyone? I know I'll be able to assure for my personal needs.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Part of my emergency kit....need to think of every possibility.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bergschneider

customer_reviews.title: Chewable tablet with decent taste
customer_reviews.text: Got these to keep on hand in case I get hungry when I am on the go. These bags are on the expensive side and it won't work as meal replacement on an omgoing basis - you'll quickly run out!
customer_reviews.author: Kuhgirl

customer_reviews.title: ... serve its purpose but the texture is very chalk like.
customer_reviews.text: it would definitely serve its purpose but the texture is very chalk like.
customer_reviews.author: kevin okeefe

customer_reviews.title: These are basically viatmins and minerals not calories. They ...
customer_reviews.text: These are basically viatmins and minerals not calories. They would only provide 240 calories a day for 8 days.
customer_reviews.author: adam wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I give bags of these to all friends who hunt in southeastern forests. Best "bang for the buck" on the market. A "must have" in the car or truck for emergency situations. Amazon found a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a supplement
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a supplement. I suppose in dire situation chewing on one of these would be like eating a candy. The chocolate one is the best. Taste like Ovaltine malt powdered drink mix compressed into a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: kjmassaro

customer_reviews.title: they taste a little like powdered milk or something
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they're the only gluten free food tabs I could find. They last 25 yrs unopened according to package. Had to open and try a pack, they taste a little like powdered milk or something, not great but what do you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Missing flavor
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Supposed to have 4 different flavors from description - 4 x 24-tab pouch (Each pouch is 1 flavor: Butterscotch, Vanilla, Strawberry, Chocolate). I only received 2 flavors. 2 butterscotch packets and 2 chocolate packets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... form first to try all the flavors and I love them all
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out in the packet form first to try all the flavors and I love them all.... Then bought them in the big size !! Perfect for your earthquake kit!
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: emergency food
customer_reviews.text: I have an emergency bag prepared - and these are in that bag. I have not opened them yet to try them - waiting for when I actually need them. I hope I never do
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skip vanilla
customer_reviews.text: Thought I ordered a variety pack of flavors. Got four vanilla. Yuck. Love the idea. I'm going to try to give them aay so I can justify trying, again, to gt the fruit flavors.
customer_reviews.author: David Boesenberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent source of protein, ordered my third batch yesterday! Tastes great, each has a similar taste that is malty, you can tell the difference in the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: have not tried these yet but have used Datrex bars which are similar. purchased these to give a variety
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not lactose free.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good. Would prefer lactose free. Would be useable to a larger population
customer_reviews.author: David Krencik

customer_reviews.title: it came on time in good shape
customer_reviews.text: hey what can i say its survival stuff read the description thats what ur getting. mine was intact good shape and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack
customer_reviews.text: The are not intended to be a meal. They taste very good, dissolve quickly and satisfy immediate craving.
customer_reviews.author: HarryD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these tabs..have added them to our emergency back packs. I wish though they made a variety without iodine...
customer_reviews.author: Violet Deiji

customer_reviews.title: Dont KNOW
customer_reviews.text: I am not using this yet it took for ever to come but I'm saving this oh dam I got to get more
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary food substitute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tabs! They taste great, and can be consumed quickly and without water. they crush easily, and dissolve quickly. I'm keeping a few in my purse, so if I'm out somewhere and suddenly feel too hungry, I can eat one or two of these quickly, and have time to get to a restaurant or get home, without getting a hunger headache. They're also going in our 72-hr bags, although we won't use them as sole subsistence.
customer_reviews.author: AT.S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Will use these for emergencies and will keep in the cars and at work d/t environmental risk factors in the area. Nice to have peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this purchase!! You will not be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.  II

customer_reviews.title: Nice taste.
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a diet supplement on the days I can't eat normally due to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great for back ups
customer_reviews.text: Not many like them but they will do if it does get bad bad.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A Go Bag Must
customer_reviews.text: These are a must for any go bag, camping backpack, car, or anywhere else you want to have emergency food on hand. These packs take up very little space for the number of days of food.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Kinda reminds me of the way powdered coffee creamer tastes. My favorite was the strawberry.
customer_reviews.author: mary elizabeth marshall

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Bought them hopefully they just continue to sit in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and taste very good much better than you will think when you see ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and taste very good much better than you will think when you see them. No chalk taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: A Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thos is a must have in these times we live in i hope i never have to taste them but i know if i do ill have nourishment to survie for 8 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf life 25yrs which was what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: havent' tired this yet. put it in the emergency bags for our vehicles incase we ever get stranded somewhere. Great shelf life 25yrs which was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: go bag food supply
customer_reviews.text: excellent product .good tasting.25 yr shelf life.great if you take in place of a meal or two.
customer_reviews.author: c w

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at taste
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Taste great. Problem will be saving them for when actually needed:):)
customer_reviews.author: james tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency Nutrition Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product to slip into your BOB or other packs or in the glove box of your truck or car, "just-in-case!" Very lightweight, doesn't take up much space either. I am not a nutritionist so I can't vouch for its caloric content or value, but the tabs taste OK, and in an emergency hopefully will provide sufficient energy to help one survive a short-term emergency. Remember the "Rule of Threes": 3 seconds to make a tactical decision; 3 minutes to restore breathing/stop bleeding; three hours to maintain core body temperature; 3 days to get water; 3 weeks to gather food; 3 months and morale breaks down!
customer_reviews.author: lmg

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasts for years. Got this just in case of emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully I will never need this, but if I ...
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I will never need this, but if I do it will be a life saver. Delivered quickly and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Meyers

customer_reviews.title: ... weird but I did try it and it wasn't bad. They kind of remind me of freeze dried ...
customer_reviews.text: The Vanilla smells weird but I did try it and it wasn't bad. They kind of remind me of freeze dried Ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! I enjoy a light breakfast at home in the morning, use these during the day, at work. Eat a normal meal in the evening. I actually feel better with this routine.
customer_reviews.author: Koobie

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste and texture for food, great for a life saver.
customer_reviews.text: The butterscotch is horrid. I have not tired the others. Other then the taste these do exactly what they need to do and might even save your life one day.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lee Miller

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: I'll update this within the next 25 years if I ever need it. Assuming there's an internet to do so (:
customer_reviews.author: Hobart the Honest

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Great product for in a bug out bag. Will buy again. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, long shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, long shelf life, and packs small. I keep a few of these in a quick response rifle shoulder bag. Fits the need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kephart2

customer_reviews.title: They're not bad.
customer_reviews.text: If these are the difference between starving to death and having enough nutrition to go another day, I'm all for it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Wallin

customer_reviews.title: good sign, hope they save me when I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Ate one, didn't get ill, good sign, hope they save me when I get lost out in the wilderness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but can supplement the basics
customer_reviews.text: The one package I tried tasted fine. Wouldn't want to have to live a week on these, but they are worth having if you want to supplement other survival food for long term storage. If I ever need them, I will be very happy I have them. Oatmeal, rice and beans are cheaper and will last a couple years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Exciting product ! Very encouraged ! Excellent customer service . Do recommend and I plan to purchase more . In short I've a sense that this product is just the ticket !
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Watts Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: good for our jw.org 'to go bags'
customer_reviews.text: we have not tasted it. Its in our bags for when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Strictly emergency
customer_reviews.text: The tabs are ok. I hope I don't have to eat 2 many of these tabs
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is kind of bland, but you get used to it. I just use it for between meals and it keeps me going.
customer_reviews.author: tmoney

customer_reviews.title: Good for emergency because of shelf life but mostly sugar and what seems to be milk powder
customer_reviews.text: taste good, long shelf life, very compact, but mostly sugar and milk powder
customer_reviews.author: JC Anin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the taste of this product and I used this for hiking scenarios and workouts. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jw W.

customer_reviews.title: The tabs are hard. I was expecting them to ...
customer_reviews.text: The tabs are hard. I was expecting them to be softer, but maybe that's not how they are supposed to be. I haven't tasted them, they are a Christmas gift for my Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Calli Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Long shelf life.
customer_reviews.text: Super long shelf life. Hope to never have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D Shomaker

customer_reviews.title: Great calorie boost for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I keep a stash in my car in case I'm miles away from food (which happens often with my job) and need quick calories. You definitely need something to wash it down with because the texture, although chewy, is slightly chalky. The taste is pretty good overall for all the flavors, fairly sweet and almost like eating candy. Re-sealable pouches they come in are sturdy, holding up quite well so far. If you are prone to crashing whenever you're low on calories, these things are lifesavers.
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Not the sort of thing one looks forward to, but good to have.
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never need to use these. But if so they’re good to have.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our emergency kit. Especially purchased for it long shelf life 25 + years. Previous products had expired after 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best item for the price. Lightweight and easy to pack around. Mandatory for your bug-out bag.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Better to be preparex
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my go bag, hope I never need them.
customer_reviews.author: K.Sell

customer_reviews.title: Great Emergency GO Bag food source
customer_reviews.text: My shipment of Survival Tabs (8 day supply) arrived very quickly and well packaged from LB1 High Performance. This is a great product to carry in the car or when hiking as an emergency food source. The bags are small and can be easily stashed in the glovebox or in a fanny pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ENDOF THE DAY THIS IS TASTY AND ID WORKING PRETTY BLOODY GOO
customer_reviews.text: i have it i am going to use it here soon cuz, i want to try it... in the desert tonight.. if it is not for filling i will let you know and give you the feedback... No Worries cuz I'm an Aussie Bushman and u really don't wanna know what i have encountered or what I've eaten' lol. ENDOF THE DAY THIS IS TASTY AND ID WORKING PRETTY BLOODY GOO, MATE!!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do they taste good? not really, but not too bad. A good addition to emergency BOB food supply.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover

customer_reviews.title: Get fuel for the body
customer_reviews.text: Get for camping or hiking. You have to get over the taste but it's really good in water. Don't know if your suppose to or not.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Daubitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to keep in case emergency. Don’t expect a prime rib with stuff like this
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Emergency stash. If another Andrew, Katrina or similar happens around here, I'm good for about a week.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried any of these. They are part of my emergency kit. I should try one packet of these just so that I know what they are like, but hate to break into my emergency stash. This is my "just in case" or boy scout 'Be Prepared" emergency food. I have and suggest that everyone have some emergency supplies. We've seen that it can take a week or more for the government to get their act together. Rather than stand on the roof hoping that someone will come, we'll take care of ourselves for the first week.
customer_reviews.author: WGE G'Dad

customer_reviews.title: I suppose if the variety it's the same (I can't tell what bag is what flavor except for one of the 24 tablet bags) it's actually
customer_reviews.text: I just received the package so I haven't tried the tabs yet but what I received was not what was pictured for sell. In stead of 4 24 tablet bags, one of each flavor, there were two 24 tablet bags and 4 12 tablet bags. I suppose if the variety it's the same (I can't tell what bag is what flavor except for one of the 24 tablet bags) it's actually better since the small ones are a singles days worth so your not opening 2 days at a time, but it's not what was pictured. So I'm a bit upset about that along with the fact I can't tell which bag is which flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Joltgeot

customer_reviews.title: calories and vitams,in sm bites
customer_reviews.text: Calories in sm bites I Got these for my Mom,who has Alz,she is in a no eating stageRefusing,But she likes Candy and she ate 3 of them rt off,they have a very good taste as i tried 2 of them, They beat nothing,have both vits and calories,Could you surivive on them.you would probably still feel hungry i did,but they would sustain your body thought they would be worth a try,Going to order her more
customer_reviews.author: Graces Mom

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get exactly as advertised... I ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get exactly as advertised...I received 2 24 tab packs, and 4 12's. It works out the same, I suppose. Yet, the professionalism of not sending what was advertised doesn't lead a person to give a higher recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: I.M. Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to pack in my survival bag
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Adams

customer_reviews.title: They'll keep you alive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tabs for our 72 hour kits. Then I ordered some extra ones to try out. I decided to try eating breakfast then having one of these every hour as recommended throughout my workday then having dinner as usual. I have to say that even doing this was somewhat difficult. I was only able to stick with it for a few days due to constant changes in my work schedule and some work lunches. Overall this will keep you alive but it will not make you feel full. I am keeping these in my 72 hour kit but I hope that I never have to rely solely on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first type of survival food I have ever tried, it won't be the last and only type, I will try all of them, eventually...this one is actually "space food" so it has everything you need in order to function properly when there's no other food source available, it tastes great, although it has some slight variations of flavor, to me honestly it's all the same, it's actually delicious and I will buy more...!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I had originally given this company a 1 star because I didn't get my full order but I have to say they did get me the remainder
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!! I had originally given this company a 1 star because I didn't get my full order but I have to say they did get me the remainder of my order so I feel an obligation to say I love these they are not candy but for sustaining you and giving you energy and they are tasty especially the butterscotch I love these I am ordering more and hopefully things will go smoothly this time the product is great and they are in my emergency backpack..
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Good for their intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Good for true survival situations because they taste awful. Don't think you'll care though what they taste like if you're life depends upon it.
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Good in a Pinch
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well. I tried the butterscotch. It was a bit strong. The tablets were not chalky or powdery (like Tums). I am on a low carb diet anyway, so these work out well. Note: This is truly for *emergency*. 12 tabs is 30 carbs, which is one meal for me (at 100 carbs a day). A typical male eats about 300 grams of carbohydrates a day.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These tabs are perfect for hiking and camping. They're small, light weight, and taste good. Exactly perfect to have on hand in case you were to get lost and need something for calories to survive. Excellent pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a couple with me at all times. So handy, tasty & gives me energy. Especially helpful before going grocery shopping after a busy day. Don't do impulse buying that way. I have one before going out to eat & only order small meals. Also helpful if there is a bad storm & electricity goes out. I hope I'm never without these survival tabs again.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered these so I bought the multi pack to try all the flavors. They are definitely better than I expected. I will buy them again to keep in my backpack for hiking and camping. I'm always looking for food that won't melt, isn't sweet, and won't get smashed in my back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a packet in the garden, one in the car, one in the house, and one in my purse. Any time I feel faint, I can chew one of these tabs and within 3-5 minutes will feel fine again. They taste mostly like dry powdered milk, nothing great but not at all offensive.
customer_reviews.author: Gardenbees

customer_reviews.title: IT is a great thing to keep in your kit or in your ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep in my camping and hunting gear as a emergency filler in case needed out in the woods. I haven't tried them yet, but they seem to be packaged well and I'm sure they will serve the purpose of emergency calories in a no food situation. They claim to have a 15 year shelf life and are packaged well with not taking up too much room. IT is a great thing to keep in your kit or in your car in case or emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Prisco

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad At All Palatable
customer_reviews.text: Having eaten these for one whole day with no ill effects, I would recommend them for a lightweight back up plan for travel, or hiking.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This would be great for an emergency situation
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and filling. Tried a pack when I had a late night hunger pang, then for a moment when I was out and about and didn't want to spent $15 on a sandwich as there was nothing else on sale. Life saver that helps me buy time to get me where I need to go while I stop hunger until I get home or a place where I can eat what I actually want. Hunger stops almost immediately after eating the tablet and lasts for around 3-4 hours if you are lying down. Around 1-2 hours if you are out and about. This would be great for an emergency situation! As tested.
customer_reviews.author: Yves G

product_meta.title: Survival Tabs 8-Day Food Supply 96 Tabs Emergency Food Replacement Disaster Preparedness for Earthquake Flood Tsunami Gluten Free and Non-GMO 25 Years Shelf Life Long Term Food Storage - Mixed Flavor
product_meta.description:
The Survival Tabs contain 100% of the U.S. RDA of 15 Essential Vitamins & Minerals. Made with the highest quality protein which is essential in survival situations where your body needs to assimilate as much as possible from what you eat.

Generally, of the food we eat, most is not absorbed as an effective use of calories . A calorie is basically a unit of energy that our bodies need to keep going. Our bodies use calories much like a car uses fuel. Because The Survival Tabs are 100% digestible and assimilated into your system, they use all of the calories to fuel your body. Combined with high-quality protein , fatty acids and carbohydrates, The Survival Tabs are an efficient means to nourish your body. The greatest possible nutrition in the smallest possible volume. 

SHELF LIFE AND SUSTAINABILITY

We have samples of The Survival Tabs that were produced in 1974-75. They have been stored at room temperature. We test them periodically and have found little, if any, deterioration or loss of vitamin or food value. Our results showed negligible loss in these areas. Freezing temperatures will have no effect at all on these tablets. We would estimate the shelf-life is 25 years, but suggest rotating them to ensure maximum food value every 2-3 years.

NUTRITION

The Survival Tabs contains: Fat 25%, Protein 9%, Carbohydrates 58%, Iron 18 mg. (as Ferrous Fumarate), other minerals, 2% (from milk solids), and the following vitamins in percentages shown of their USRDA adult allowance. There are approximately 20 calories in a 3.9 gram The Survival Tab.Package Includes:

- 4 x 24-tab pouch (Each pouch is 1 flavor: Butterscotch, Vanilla, Strawberry, Chocolate).
feature_bullets: Contain 100% of 15 Essential Vitamins & Minerals. Made with the highest quality protein. GLUTEN FREE and NON-GMO.

The 'Just in Case' Food Supply, The Survival Tabs backup for the situations such as natural disasters. This is the best possible food in the smallest possible volume. Created to supply the body with all the daily essential vitamins and minerals needed when facing uncertainty. The compact design allows for easy storage and is perfect for individual emergency kits.
This convenient portable, personal pouches will sustain a person for 8 days | This calculation is based upon one average person. Consumption requirements may vary from person to person.

Flavor: Mixed Flavor - Each pouch is 1 flavor - Butterscotch, Vanilla, Strawberry and Chocolate. | Contains: 24 Tablets x 4 pouches = 96 Tablets. | Servings: 12 Chewable Tablets - 20 Calories per tab.
Weight: Approximately 10 ounces per pouch. Dimensions (inches): 5.5 x 8.5 x 2.75 (W x H x L).
